nodes.text: Figg Excavations (FiggEx) was a subsidiary company of the Outer Javin Company, headquartered on Gerrenthum.

It mined heavily on Ione and was a member corporation of the Mining Guild. The company lost respect and profit when it was discovered they were hiring pirates to attack their own convoys as a means to gain the protection of the Anoat sector police forces and split from the Mining Guild.
